name: Potato War
description:
This is an unfinished symphony game as you can notice by the missing art. This is my first game so I'm not sure that I calculated everything and set up gameplay properly. Please play and give me feedback if something is not right.

This is supposed to be a mobile game so the keyboard controls are not comfy. I know, I play it too. Sorry.

Keyboard controls:

W - Upper Left

S - Bottom Left

P - Upper Right

L - Bottom Right

E - Throw the Poison potato

O - Throw the Hot potato

! You can play from the phone: buttons respond to touch as if it's just a mobile game.

Rules:

Move the basket to catch potatoes, each potato gives 1 point; 

Poison potatoes can be thrown at an opponent when he is on the screen to reduce the speed (catch potato and when you need it to activate - push the E button or touch the opponents image if you play on the phone); 

Hot potatoes can be thrown at the Missing board to reduce the missed points (catch potato and then you can push the O button to activate it or touch the Missing board if you play on the phone).

3 (three) missed potatoes - end of the game.

Catch the opponent's potato (blue or pink) - end of the game.

Share your biggest score!
